content: I did not find in spec an explicit definition of response content-type header. Should or must it be application/fhir+json or it can be just application/json?

nicola (RIO/SS) said:

I did not find in spec an explicit definition of response content-type header. Should or must it be application/fhir+json or it can be just application/json?

http://hl7.org/fhir/http.html#mime-type
